1.title: RIP Uncle Pete
1.plot: Two freeloading siblings find out over a disastrous family dinner that their uncle has died and he's left them a motel, and it may or may not be a stroke of luck in this horror-comedy series.

2.title: Checking In
2.plot: Although the motel turned out to be a dump, Jack and Laurie still want the deed. They learn that in order to claim their inheritance, they must stay one night in the Ship's Helm Motel.

3.title: Do Not Disturb
3.plot: Jack and Laurie split up into their own rooms for the night. However, they soon find out that the motel is a lot more than they bargained for and the night takes an interesting turn.

4.title: An Extended Stay
4.plot: Jack and Laurie decide to abandon the Ship's Helm Motel. Sid insists this isn't an option and explains the ominous nature of his work as their uncle's lawyer. Jack and Laurie attempt to lure their friends to the hotel for a party.

5.title: Misery Loves Company
5.plot: Preparations continue for a party - will anyone show?

imdb.plot outline: Siblings Jack and Laurie receive a mysterious letter informing them that their Uncle Pete has died and left them his motel at the Jersey Shore. Upon their arrival, Uncle Pete's sinister lawyer informs them that in order to claim their inheritance, they must spend one night inside it. After a tumultuous night full of run-ins with the strange staff and other guests, Jack and Laurie discover that they can't leave the cursed motel, so their only course of action is to plan one big rager and trap their friends with them.
imdb.title: The Off Season
plot: Siblings Jack and Laurie receive a mysterious letter informing them that their Uncle Pete has died and left them his motel at the Jersey Shore. Upon their arrival, Uncle Pete's sinister lawyer informs them that in order to claim their inheritance, they must spend one night inside it. After a tumultuous night full of run-ins with the strange staff and other guests, Jack and Laurie discover that they can't leave the cursed motel, so their only course of action is to plan one big rager and trap their friends with them.

Siblings Jack and Laurie inherit a cursed motel from their dead uncle and find themselves unable to leave. The place is a dump and the staff is creepy, so in order to keep them from having to spend eternity with only each other, they devise a plan to trap all their friends.
